events.message: I received the wrong item and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is very disappointing.
The issue involving the wrong item received was categorized under Refund to proceed with the correct handling.
A customer support agent was assigned to handle this refund request promptly and carefully.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the mistake with your order. I’m here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached a clear photo showing the incorrect item I received instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately and you should see the amount back on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and clarification. I appreciate you handling this so smoothly and hope to shop here again.
I have marked the refund as processed and the case is now resolved. Please reach out if you have any further concerns.
Just checking in to confirm that the refund has been received and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As you confirmed receipt of the refund, we will now close this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to help us improve our customer service. We would appreciate your feedback.
